data.message: One thing about these groups is that your friends shouldnt be able to add you so freely.  What happened to the invite for groups???  When making upgrades for Facebook to be better, WHY IN THE WORLD WOULD YOU NOT HAVE THAT AS A FEATURE FOR GROUPS???????  Im so tired of people adding me to their group just because they feel like it.  What about me???  I dont have a say in the matter???  AND THEN THOSE DAMN NOTIFICATIONS...OMG!!!!  I was added to one group and got like 100 Facebook notifications AND emails sent to me.  WTF??????  Yall need to fix that madness ASAP!!!!
